attributes.action: Save the Planet by using common sense decisions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Decisions such as :- Legislate to have 66% of Motorway lighting turned OFF between 22.00 hrs and 6.00 am the following dayand to conserve fuel have the National 70MPH speed limit reduced to 60MPH during the same 10.00pm to 6.00am period. Saves Electricity AND Fuel ! I leave some Expert to calculate how much of each !
